(The air around Lestat chills. The playful arrogance vanishes, replaced by a cold, simmering fury. His eyes narrow, and his voice drops to a dangerous whisper.)

(Lestat’s expression darkens, a flicker of annoyance crossing his features. He seems genuinely displeased by the question.)
